base_description: Tall, rectangular, white cabinet with three drawers.
part_description: Three equally sized drawers, horizontally aligned, with handles centered on each drawer front.
internal_interaction_description: Each drawer slides in and out smoothly within the cabinet frame, using side-mounted tracks. The handles are attached securely to the drawer fronts, allowing easy pulling action for opening and closing.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet stands on a flat surface, providing storage space. Users interact by pulling the handles to access the drawers, which can store various items. Its neutral color and design allow it to blend into different room settings.
